input_query:
You plan to visit 3 European cities for 14 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 2 days in Stockholm. You want to spend 7 days in Athens. You want to spend 7 days in Reykjavik. You would like to meet your friends at Reykjavik between day 2 and day 8 to tour together.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Stockholm and Athens, from Reykjavik to Athens, Stockholm and Reykjavik.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 14 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
